  1. Oxford 3000
  2. Oxford 08

Words 701-800

  1. dentist
    I have an appointment with the dentist tomorrow.

  2. deny
    She will not deny the truth when asked.

  3. department
    He works in the sales department of the company.

  4. departure
    The departure of the train is scheduled for 8 a.m.

  5. depend
    Children depend on their parents for support.

  6. depressed
    He felt depressed after hearing the bad news.

  7. depressing
    The movie was so depressing that I couldn’t stop crying.

  8. depth
    The depth of the lake is more than 20 meters.

  9. describe
    Can you describe the man you saw?

  10. description
    The description of the place was very detailed.

  11. desert
    The desert is hot and dry during the day.

  12. deserve
    You deserve a reward for your hard work.

  13. design
    She helped design the new website.

  14. designer
    The designer created a beautiful dress for the event.

  15. desire
    He has a strong desire to learn new things.

  16. desk
    There is a computer on the desk.

  17. desperate
    She was desperate to find her lost keys.

  18. despite
    Despite the rain, they continued their journey.

  19. destination
    Paris is a popular destination for tourists.

  20. destroy
    The fire will destroy the old building.

  21. detail
    Please explain the plan in detail.

  22. detailed
    The report includes a detailed analysis of the data.

  23. detect
    The machine can detect even small changes in temperature.

  24. detective
    The detective solved the mystery quickly.

  25. determine
    We need to determine the cause of the problem.

  26. determined
    She is determined to succeed in her career.

  27. develop
    They plan to develop a new app for students.

  28. development
    The development of the city has been rapid.

  29. device
    This device helps people track their fitness goals.

  30. diagram
    The teacher drew a diagram on the board to explain the process.

  31. dialogue
    The dialogue between the characters was very interesting.

  32. diamond
    She wore a diamond ring on her finger.

  33. diary
    She writes in her diary every night before bed.

  34. dictionary
    Use a dictionary to check the meaning of the word.

  35. die
    Plants die without water and sunlight.

  36. diet
    He follows a healthy diet to stay fit.

  37. difference
    There is a big difference between the two options.

  38. different
    The twins have very different personalities.

  39. differently
    She sees the world differently from others.

  40. difficult
    The exam was more difficult than I expected.

  41. difficulty
    He had difficulty solving the math problem.

  42. dig
    They will dig a hole to plant the tree.

  43. digital
    She prefers reading digital books on her tablet.

  44. dinner
    We had pasta for dinner last night.

  45. direct
    The teacher gave us direct instructions for the task.

  46. direction
    Can you tell me the direction to the nearest bus stop?

  47. directly
    The train goes directly to the city center.

  48. director
    The director of the movie won an award.

  49. dirt
    There was dirt on the floor after the storm.

  50. dirty
    The children came home with dirty clothes.

  51. disadvantage
    One disadvantage of living in the city is the noise.

  52. disagree
    I disagree with your opinion on this matter.

  53. disappear
    The sun will disappear behind the clouds soon.

  54. disappointed
    She was disappointed when her team lost the game.

  55. disappointing
    The ending of the movie was disappointing.

  56. disaster
    The flood was a natural disaster that affected many people.

  57. disc
    He bought a music disc from the store.

  58. discipline
    Discipline is important for success in life.

  59. discount
    The store is offering a discount on all items this week.

  60. discover
    They hope to discover new planets in the future.

  61. discovery
    The discovery of the ancient city was amazing.

  62. discuss
    Let’s discuss the project in the meeting tomorrow.

  63. discussion
    The discussion about the topic lasted for hours.

  64. disease
    The doctor is working to find a cure for the disease.

  65. dish
    My favorite dish is spaghetti with tomato sauce.

  66. dishonest
    It is dishonest to lie to your friends.

  67. dislike
    I dislike waking up early in the morning.

  68. dismiss
    The teacher will dismiss the class after the bell rings.

  69. display
    The museum will display the new paintings next week.

  70. distance
    The distance between the two cities is 50 miles.

  71. distribute
    They will distribute the books to the students.

  72. distribution
    The distribution of food to the poor was well-organized.

  73. district
    This district is known for its beautiful parks.

  74. divide
    Let’s divide the cake into equal parts.

  75. division
    The division of the work made the task easier.

  76. divorced
    Her parents are divorced but still get along well.

  77. do1
    What will you do after school today?

  78. doctor
    The doctor advised him to rest for a few days.

  79. document
    Please sign the document before submitting it.

  80. documentary
    We watched a documentary about wildlife last night.

  81. dog
    The dog barked loudly at the stranger.

  82. dollar
    The book costs ten dollars at the store.

  83. domestic
    Domestic flights are usually cheaper than international ones.

  84. dominate
    His team will dominate the competition this year.

  85. donate
    She decided to donate her old clothes to charity.

  86. door
    Please close the door when you leave.

  87. double
    He ordered a double portion of fries for lunch.

  88. adv.
    The word “quickly” is an adv. that describes how something happens.

  89. doubt
    I doubt that it will rain today.

  90. down
    The cat climbed down from the tree.

  91. download
    You can download the app from the website.

  92. downstairs
    She went downstairs to answer the door.

  93. downwards
    The ball rolled downwards after hitting the hill.

  94. dozen
    He bought a dozen eggs from the market.

  95. draft
    She is working on the first draft of her essay.

  96. drag
    They had to drag the heavy table across the room.

  97. drama
    The drama club is performing a new play this weekend.

  98. dramatic
    The view from the mountain was dramatic and beautiful.

  99. draw
    Can you draw a picture of a house for me?

  100. drawing
    Her drawing of the sunset was very impressive.
